feature_model.name: FeatureIDE model
feature_model.feature_tree: :r VODPlayer(VODPlayer) :g [1,1] : StartPlayer(StartPlayer) : Pause(Pause) : PlayImm(PlayImm) : StartMovie(StartMovie) :o StopMovie(StopMovie) : VCRInterf(VCRInterf) : Quit(Quit) : SelectMovie(SelectMovie) :o ChangeServer(ChangeServer) :o Detail(Detail)
